attribute.value: select dmz as key,dmms as value from CSB_DMMS where dmmc ='KHZQ'
select dmz as key,dmms as value from CSB_DMMS where dmmc ='KHZQ' and 1=2
select dmz as key , RTRIM(dmms) as value from CSB_DMMS where lower(dmmc)='zxpfkhzt' and dmz in ('1','2') order by dmz

select distinct fapz.fabh as key, fapz.famc as value from khfa_fapz fapz inner join khfa_khzbpz khzbpz on khzbpz.fabh = fapz.fabh where fapz.khdx='2' and khzbpz.jsfs = '3' and fapz.khnf = $khnf$ and fapz.khzq = $khzq$
select csz from xtb_xtcs where csmc='PFJSTS'

sqlMap.select: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select fapz.khnf,case when zxpffa.khzq=1 then '月' when zxpffa.khzq=2 then '季' else '年' end as khzq, case when zxpffa.khzq=1 then '第'||F_NUMTOCHAR(zxpfz.khqs)||'月' when zxpffa.khzq=2 and $khqs$=1 then '第一季度' when zxpffa.khzq=2 and $khqs$=2 then '第二季度' when zxpffa.khzq=2 and $khqs$=3 then '第三季度' when zxpffa.khzq=2 and $khqs$=4 then '第四季度' else '' end as khqs,dmms1.dmms as khzt,khhy.hydh as khhyh,khhy.hymc as khhymc,jg.jgmc as khhyssjg ,fapz.famc,zbpz.wdmc,coalesce(zbjg.khzbmc,zbpz.xmmc) khzbmc , case when zxpfz.jflx='1' then '打分者权重计分' when zxpfz.jflx='2' then '打分者平均得分' when zxpfz.jflx='3' then '打分者平均得分(去掉一个最高分，一个最低分)' when zxpfz.jflx='4' then '在权重比例内再取人员平均(去掉一个最高分，一个最低分)' when zxpfz.jflx='5' then '在权重比例内再取人员平均' when zxpfz.jflx='6' then '打分者平均得分(去掉两个最高分，两个最低分)' end jflx, hy.hydh as pjrhyh,hy.hymc as pjr,pjjg.jgmc as pjrssjg,dmms2.dmms as pfzt from khfa_fapz fapz inner join khfa_khzbpz zbpz on fapz.fabh = zbpz.fabh left join khfa_khzb_hy zbjg on zbjg.khzbdh = zbpz.khzbdh inner join khfa_zxpffa zxpffa on zxpffa.fabh = fapz.fabh inner join khfa_zxpfz zxpfz on zxpfz.fabh=zxpffa.fabh and zxpfz.pjr = zxpffa.pjr and zxpfz.khqs = zxpffa.khqs and zxpfz.khdxdh = zxpffa.khdxdh and zxpfz.khzbdh=zbpz.khzbdh inner join khdx_hy hy on hy.khdxdh = zxpffa.pjr inner join khdx_jgcy pjcy on hy.khdxdh=pjcy.khdxdh and pjcy.jsrq=29991231 inner join khdx_jg pjjg on pjcy.jgkhdxdh=pjjg.khdxdh inner join csb_dmms dmms1 on dmms1.dmmc='ZXPFKHZT' and dmms1.dmz= zxpffa.khzt inner join csb_dmms dmms2 on dmms2.dmmc='PFZT' and dmms2.dmz = zxpffa.pfzt inner join khdx_hy khhy on zxpfz.khdxdh=khhy.khdxdh inner join khdx_jgcy cy on cy.khdxdh = khhy.khdxdh and zxpffa.khqm between cy.qsrq and cy.jsrq inner join khdx_jg jg on cy.jgkhdxdh=jg.khdxdh where 1=1 and zxpffa.khdx='2' and zbpz.jsfs='3' and fapz.yyzlbh=2 and zxpffa.khdxdh in ($khdxdh$) and zxpffa.pjr in ($pjr$) and zxpffa.pfzt = '$pfzt$' and zxpffa.khzt='$khzt$' and fapz.fabh = $fabh$ and fapz.khzq=$khzq$ and zxpffa.khqs=$khqs$ and fapz.khnf = $khnf$ and zxpfz.khdx='2' AND fapz.zt ='1' order by fapz.khnf ,fapz.khzq,fapz.khqs,zxpffa.khzt,zxpffa.pfzt,hy.hydh,khhy.hydh,fapz.famc,zbpz.wdmc asc
